Adds a Client Side Javascript Clip Link
----
!!Parameters
clip * the clip to paste
----
!!Usage:
{{{
[{JSClip clip="some code"}]
}}}
[{JSClip clip="some code"}]

----
!!renderer.sjs
{{{clip = extension.getAttributeValueByName("clip");

data = "<a href=\"\" onclick=\"addJSClip('";
data += clip;
data += "');return false;\" title=\"Paste Code\"><img src=\"/OpenForum/Images/icons/gif/page_paste.gif\" border=\"0\"></a>"

return data;}}}
